payload.name: congestion-control-aqm-decide-whether-the-system-collapses-under-load
payload.title: Congestion control + AQM decide whether the system collapses under load
payload.formal: queue discipline (RED/CoDel) and pacing prevent bufferbloat and collapse.
payload.apm2_mapping: HEF resource governance is AQM: bounded queues, rate limits, drop priority. Extend the same design to: tool execution pools, ledger append contention, CAS retrieval, and CI import. The measurable goal is stability under load (no oscillation, bounded tail latency).
